locations: New York City, New York, USA::(studio) (Manhattan studio)
imdb.plot outline: Experts and influencers from the world of health, beauty, fashion, food, fitness and entertainment, discuss interesting, relevant and compelling topics. In-studio discussion, also with footage of places reflecting the conversation are part of each segment. Viewers are also encouraged to connect with the show's social networks to experience the places and opportunities featured during each episode.
imdb.title: Ernie Anastos in New York
akas: Ernie Anastos in New York (United States)
plot: Ernie Anastos In New York is a discussion/lifestyles broadcast television program airing on the New York FOX station (FOX 5) at 5:30pm on Saturdays. Anastos profiles people, places and things to do in the world's most exciting city.::Melonte Partners

Experts and influencers from the world of health, beauty, fashion, food, fitness and entertainment, discuss interesting, relevant and compelling topics. In-studio discussion, also with footage of places reflecting the conversation are part of each segment. Viewers are also encouraged to connect with the show's social networks to experience the places and opportunities featured during each episode.::Melonte Partners
